ygData.subject: Song Icon Bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm I was in kedge a few days ago and a realization hit me... My icons don t flash anymore before they fade. When I was a young bard growing up, I used to
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm

I was in kedge a few days ago and a realization hit me...

My icons don't flash anymore before they fade. When I was a young bard
growing up, I used to see flashing icons all the time, reminding me that my
buff was about to fade so that I could refresh it. I know that my ranger
still sees his icons fading. (it's just that I almost never play him
anymore) But bards are not so lucky.

Anyone know why or when this change made it in, and does anyone else feel
that we should fight to get it back?

If I hadn't had Tarew's memmed, I would have been EXTREMELY nervous being in
kedge with no idea when my enduring breath was going to fade.

Draelon
